sections.text: Failure to comply with section 77-2621 shall be cause for revocation of the permit issued under section 77-2621 and forfeiture of the bond posted pursuant to section 77-2621.SourceLaws 1951, c. 255, ยง 2, p. 877;Laws 2011, LB590, ยง 38.

77-2622.Common carrier; unstamped cigarettes; bond; permit; violation; penalty.

Failure to comply with section 77-2621 shall be cause for revocation of the permit issued under section 77-2621 and forfeiture of the bond posted pursuant to section 77-2621.

SourceLaws 1951, c. 255, ยง 2, p. 877;Laws 2011, LB590, ยง 38.
